function.name: vcsfmt
function.doc:
vcsfmt file produced in same directory as given file. This method simply forwards to the appropriate strategy depending on the original format of the file (FASTA, Genebank, etc.)
TODO: redo cldoc so that it has all args

argument.name: filename
argument.doc: the file to produce a vcsfmt file from.

function.name: de_vcsfmt
function.brief: Produces unformatted file from vcsfmt file.
function.doc: Unformatted file produced in same directory as vcsfmt file. This method simply forwards to the appropriate strategy depending on the original format of the file (FASTA, Genebank, etc.)

argument.name: filename
argument.doc: the file to produce an unformatted version of.
